p: Valacyclovir has a generally benign safety profile with minimally higher rates of headache and dizziness compared with placebo in controlled treatment trials. 28 In the post-marketing phase, initial double-blind followed by intermittent and continuous valacyclovir treatment for up to 7 years showed no major side effects. 34 35 Hallucinations, delirium and seizures can occur in less than 1% of patients with renal failure who are taking valacyclovir. 36
